name: Dominguez Nguyen
comment: With Face Tracking turned on, the camera will automatically follow the face being tracked and keep it in the center of the frame

name: Bowers Spence
comment: In continuous shooting mode, nine photos can be captured continuously with just one click of the shutter button

name: Church Moran
comment: When youâ€™re done filming, transfer the video clips to your smartphone via Intelligent Silent Transfer or the import function, and use the Moza Artist app to apply basic creative edits to your videos

name: Holland Beach
comment: Use this mostly automated mode to easily capture wide panoramic shots

name: Larsen Fuller
comment: Canon is applying irreversible noise reduction to all its Raws, at all ISOs. This of course comes at the cost of detail & contrast, particularly in low contrast shadows

name: Marie Dennis
comment: Most important for my work is the bulletproof housing. My gear goes out to sea, down into the Grand Canyon, and everything dirty and dusty.
